name: Zombie Survival And Hunting
description: Zombie survival and hunting is the most realistic death war and action game. Become a contract killer, you feel as a real commando, you have to kill all the zombies in your area and clear the houses to kill dangerous zombies. Assassinate the zombie with your favorite  weapon because you are a soldier from the army force. This game is here for your great excitement time. Use your skills to shoot every target you can in this shooting . Killing zombie is not bored game, everybody likes shooting action game. This is the best chance for better shooter to test your shooting skills.
